content:
Advanced semantic role labeling for harmful meme detection.
Key features:
Named Entity Recognition (NER) Wu-Palmer similarity for role assignment Competition placement: 8th in CONSTRAINT 2022 shared task Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
summary: Jan–May 2022: Classified entities in memes as hero/villain/victim/other. NER + Wu-Palmer similarity. 8th place @ CONSTRAINT 2022 (F1: 23.855).
title: Dissecting Harmful Memes – Semantic Role Labeling
